subject: Re: Couple from Joe's Box this morning
author: Steve Hultay
full_text:
Kristin,

Yeah, i went back and listened and caught the end of that file.  But 
like you said, it is a bit rough to catch.  Yeah, i want to believe 
that they are dead too but i can't be sure of that.  We may never 
know who is speaking through these devices, all i know is that they 
are and it fascinates me.  We need clearer communication to get the 
whole story, i think we have made great progress here though.  I am 
light years ahead of where i was this time last year, so it is 
getting better all the time.  All we can do is stay dedicated to this 
and hopefully there will be a breakthrough someday.

-Steve H.



--- In EVP-ITC@yahoogroups.com, "Kristin Morris" <ckmorris95@...> 
wrote:
>
> I heard all of those as you did.. but I read Margaret's response to 
your
> files and I agree that I hear Mother Fkr at the end of the Adios 
clip.  It's
> rough but there.
> 
> And I have no clue who these spirits are.  My gut tells me they are 
people
> who have died.. but I can't say if my gut is right or not.  I 
noticed they
> don't like to talk about themselves.  Why the big secret?  To me 
that is the
> bigger mystery.
> 
> k
> 
>  
> 
>   _____  
> 
> From: EVP-ITC@yahoogroups.com [mailto:EVP-ITC@yahoogroups.com] On 
Behalf Of
> Steve Hultay
> Sent: Thursday, April 03, 2008 10:18 PM
> To: EVP-ITC@yahoogroups.com
> Subject: [EVP-ITC] Couple from Joe's Box this morning
> 
>  
> 
> 
> Couple pretty good files in here, sorry for the cursing file. That 
> makes this more real to me and they know that. I don't believe they 
> curse because they don't like me, i think they know i post the 
audio 
> for others to hear and want to prove their existence. I also got 
> the "Are We Dead?" file. That maybe the first clear message that's 
> relevant to what we are doing, it must be grounded spirits asking 
> that. If anyone has any thoughts of who would say that, it may be 
> another discussion. Maybe it's not grounded spirits, but whom than?
> 
> -Steve H.
>
